summary: A new starlet is discovered and has ups and downs in Italian films.
cast: Lucia Bosè|Gino Cervi|Andrea Checchi|Ivan Desny|Monica Clay|Alain Cuny|Anna Carena|Enrico Glori|Laura Tiberti|Oscar Andriani|Gisella Sofio|Elio Steiner|Luisa Rivelli|Nino Dal Fabbro|Antonio Acqua|Emma Druetti|Rita Giannuzzi|Vittorio Manfrino|Rita Mara|Mario Meniconi|Lyla Rocco|Gino Rossi|Nuri Neva Sangro|Xenia Valderi
title: La señora sin camelias
